description: A minor healing endeavor, restores a small amount of vitality
A decent healing, restores a moderate amount of vitality
A great healing, restores a large portion of health

effect: let x = 1; let ID = setInterval(() => { updateItem(player.id, ['health'], [Math.min(player.health + 20, player.maxhealth)], 'players'); x += 1; if (x > 4) {clearInterval(ID)} }, 500);
description: A continous regeneration of life that heals up to 80 hp over 20 seconds
